Starters.name: Pepper Chicken
Starters.description: Spicy and succulent chicken pieces tossed in a flavorful pepper sauce. This is a very spicy dish.

Starters.name: Chicken Kabab
Starters.description: Tender chicken marinated in yogurt and spices, grilled to perfection. Mildly spicy.

Starters.name: Chicken Wings
Starters.description: Crispy fried chicken wings coated in a tangy and spicy sauce. This is a medium spicy dish.

Starters.name: Mutton Fry
Starters.description: Tender mutton pieces pan-fried with a mix of traditional spices. Medium spicy.

Starters.name: Prawn Fry
Starters.description: Juicy prawns marinated and fried for a crispy and flavorful starter. Mildly spicy.

Starters.name: Vegetable Samosa
Starters.description: Crispy fried pastry filled with a savory mix of spiced potatoes and peas. Mildly spicy.

Starters.name: Paneer Tikka
Starters.description: Cubes of soft cottage cheese marinated in a spiced yogurt blend and grilled with vegetables. Mildly spicy.

Gravies.name: Chicken Gravy
Gravies.description: A classic home-style chicken curry with a rich and savory gravy. Medium spicy.

Gravies.name: Chicken Makhanwali
Gravies.description: A creamy and buttery chicken dish, famously known as Butter Chicken. Not spicy.

Gravies.name: Mutton Curry
Gravies.description: Tender mutton cooked in a spicy and aromatic gravy, perfect with rice or bread. Medium spicy.

Gravies.name: Pork Vindaloo
Gravies.description: A fiery and tangy pork curry from Goa, with roots in Portuguese cuisine. Very spicy.

Gravies.name: Kadai Paneer
Gravies.description: Cubes of paneer with bell peppers and onions in a spiced tomato-based gravy. Medium spicy.

Gravies.name: Dal Makhani
Gravies.description: A creamy and rich lentil dish slow-cooked with butter and cream. Not spicy.

Gravies.name: Fish Curry
Gravies.description: Tender fish fillets cooked in a tangy coconut-based gravy. Mildly spicy.

Main Course.name: Chicken Biryani
Main Course.description: A savory chicken and rice dish with layers of chicken, rice, and aromatics steamed together. Medium spicy.

Main Course.name: Mutton Biryani
Main Course.description: A royal dish with beautifully spiced and fragrant layers of biryani rice centered with juicy, tender mutton. Medium spicy.

Main Course.name: Chicken Fried Rice
Main Course.description: Classic fried rice with tender chicken pieces, vegetables, and a savory soy sauce blend. Mildly spicy.

Main Course.name: Vegetable Biryani
Main Course.description: Fragrant basmati rice cooked with a variety of fresh vegetables and aromatic spices. Mildly spicy.
ingredients: Possible allergens: Dairy (if served with raita).

Main Course.name: Egg Fried Rice
Main Course.description: Wok-tossed rice with scrambled eggs and vegetables in a savory sauce. Not spicy.

Main Course.name: Schezwan Chicken Fried Rice
Main Course.description: A fiery and flavorful fried rice dish with chicken and a special Schezwan sauce. Very spicy.

Main Course.name: Hakka Noodles
Main Course.description: Stir-fried noodles with mixed vegetables and a hint of soy sauce. Mildly spicy.

Pizza.name: Chicken Pizza
Pizza.description: Classic pizza topped with seasoned chicken, mozzarella cheese, and a tangy tomato sauce. Mildly spicy.

Pizza.name: Margarita Pizza
Pizza.description: A simple and delicious pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, basil, and olive oil. Not spicy.

Pizza.name: Tandoori Paneer Pizza
Pizza.description: Pizza with tandoori-marinated paneer, onions, and bell peppers. Medium spicy.

Pizza.name: Veggie Supreme Pizza
Pizza.description: Loaded with a colorful assortment of vegetables like mushrooms, olives, and corn. Not spicy.

Pizza.name: Chicken Alfredo Pizza
Pizza.description: A rich and creamy pizza with Alfredo sauce, chicken, and spinach. Not spicy.

Pizza.name: Hawaiian Pizza
Pizza.description: A classic sweet and savory pizza with ham and pineapple. Not spicy.

Breads.name: Kerala Parota
Breads.description: A layered flatbread, originating from the Indian subcontinent, made from maida flour. Not spicy.

Breads.name: Chappati
Breads.description: A simple and soft unleavened flatbread made from whole wheat flour. Not spicy.

Breads.name: Butter Naan
Breads.description: A soft, fluffy naan bread brushed with melted butter. Not spicy.

Breads.name: Garlic Naan
Breads.description: Naan bread infused with minced garlic and herbs, and brushed with butter. Not spicy.

Breads.name: Tandoori Roti
Breads.description: A whole wheat flatbread baked in a tandoor (clay oven). Not spicy.

Breads.name: Cheese Naan
Breads.description: Soft naan bread stuffed with a generous amount of melted cheese. Not spicy.

Biryani Combos (Serves 5 Ppl).name: Mutton Biryani Combo
Biryani Combos (Serves 5 Ppl).description: A family pack of our royal Mutton Biryani, served with raita and gravy. Medium spicy.

Biryani Combos (Serves 5 Ppl).name: Chicken Biryani Combo
Biryani Combos (Serves 5 Ppl).description: A generous portion of our classic Chicken Biryani for the whole family. Medium spicy.

Biryani Combos (Serves 5 Ppl).name: Vegetable Biryani Combo
Biryani Combos (Serves 5 Ppl).description: A family pack of our fragrant Vegetable Biryani, served with raita and salad. Mildly spicy.

Biryani Combos (Serves 5 Ppl).name: Prawn Biryani Combo
Biryani Combos (Serves 5 Ppl).description: A family pack of our delicious Prawn Biryani with raita and salad. Medium spicy.

Biryani Combos (Serves 5 Ppl).name: Egg Biryani Combo
Biryani Combos (Serves 5 Ppl).description: A combo pack of our flavorful Egg Biryani for the family. Mildly spicy.

Desserts.name: Gulab Jamun
Desserts.description: Soft, deep-fried milk-solids dumplings soaked in a rose-flavored sugar syrup. Not spicy.

Desserts.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
Desserts.description: A rich chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center, served with vanilla ice cream. Not spicy.

Desserts.name: Kulfi
Desserts.description: Traditional Indian ice cream made with sweetened and thickened milk, flavored with cardamom and saffron. Not spicy.

Desserts.name: Gajar Halwa
Desserts.description: A classic Indian dessert made from grated carrots, milk, sugar, and nuts. Not spicy.

Desserts.name: Rasmalai
Desserts.description: Soft, spongy cheese patties soaked in a sweetened, thickened milk infused with cardamom. Not spicy.

Desserts.name: Brownie with Ice Cream
Desserts.description: A warm chocolate brownie served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream. Not spicy.

Drinks.name: Masala Chai
Drinks.description: A spiced tea beverage made with black tea, milk, and a blend of aromatic spices. Not spicy.

Drinks.name: Filter Coffee
Drinks.description: A strong, decoction-style coffee popular in South India, served with milk and sugar. Not spicy.

Drinks.name: Espresso
Drinks.description: A strong, concentrated coffee brew. Not spicy.

Drinks.name: Cappuccino
Drinks.description: An espresso-based coffee drink prepared with steamed milk foam. Not spicy.

Drinks.name: Hot Chocolate
Drinks.description: A warm, comforting beverage made with melted chocolate or cocoa powder and milk. Not spicy.

Drinks.name: Green Tea
Drinks.description: A healthy and refreshing tea, rich in antioxidants. Not spicy.

Drinks.name: Fresh Lime Soda
Drinks.description: A refreshing and tangy beverage made with fresh lime juice, sugar, and soda. Not spicy.

Drinks.name: Mango Lassi
Drinks.description: A sweet and creamy yogurt-based drink blended with ripe mango pulp. Not spicy.

Drinks.name: Iced Tea
Drinks.description: A chilled, sweet tea served over ice with a slice of lemon. Not spicy.

Drinks.name: Cold Coffee
Drinks.description: A creamy and frothy coffee blended with milk and ice cream. Not spicy.

Drinks.name: Strawberry Milkshake
Drinks.description: A thick and creamy shake blended with fresh strawberries and milk. Not spicy.

Drinks.name: Orange Juice
Drinks.description: Freshly squeezed orange juice, a perfect way to start your day. Not spicy.
